items.content_html: FilePreview.js is a lightweight JavaScript library that allows you to enhance the file upload functionality on your website by providing image previews for selected files. It improves the user experience by enabling users to visualize the files they are about to upload, especially when dealing with images.
items.title: worasakthaicodex/filePreviewjs: FilePreview.js is a lightweight JavaScript library that allows you to enhance the file upload functionality on your website by providing image previews for selected files. It improves the user experience by enabling users to visualize the files they are about to upload, especially when dealing with images.
